Product IdProduct NameQuantityPrice
{{i.id}} {{i.name}} {{i.quantity}} {{i.price | number : '.2'}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent { product :any; constructor(private http:HttpClient) {} ngOnInit():void{ this.http.get("http://localhost:8888/PRODUCT-SERVICE/products?projection=fullProduct").subscribe({ next : (data)=>{ console.table(data) this.product=data; }, error:(err)=>{ } }) } }
